Chemical Actions and Uses/Pharmacologic Actions/Therapeutic Uses/Antineoplastic Agents/Myeloablative Agonists
Record.Description: Agents that destroy bone marrow activity. They are used to prepare patients for BONE MARROW TRANSPLANTATION or STEM CELL TRANSPLANTATION.
